reviews.content: Sometimes might cause a respring if u close the tab when u have it open in Milky Way but still an amazing tweak nonetheless
Working on iPhone X, great to use 2 or 3 apps at once!
Working on ios 13.3 XS Max A12. Only issue is Facetime crashes when trying to minimize Facetime window in app switcher.
Make sure to not open and close windows too fast because it will crash. Everything works fine if you are careful.
